messages.message:
At long last, we have CPU and memory limits set on Dogfood and UAT envs for all services (except model service and model training service)
Dogfood deploy is running, once done - dogfood env will have these limits. I and @kunal are monitoring, in case there is any instability.
any reason why model service and model training service do not want to set CPU and memory limits? I thought for all our customers they need to set some resource limit to any services

Yes! They will definitely need to, we haven’t done much testing here and don’t have a good idea of where to set the limits for now, so I figured we would skip those for now until we have a chance to do some more testing.
this is great, thanks for applying in the limits there! will be great to see any issues there :slightly_smiling_face:
lol :stuck_out_tongue: limit had to be removed within 1 hr as atleast mount-service broke
